website_summaries.verdict: Absorbent microfiber padding for those just entering the yoga towel market.
pros: This towel prevents slippage even if you don't perspire a lot or want to spray the towel with water before starting class
If you do sweat puddles, however, this towel feels like nirvana
Retains fresh smell and grip throughout even the hardest of yoga sessions
cons: There isn't a "grippy" side to this towel, which annoys some people
However, if you're not happy, customer service provides quick refunds or replacements

customer_reviews.title: Stains your gear
customer_reviews.text: I got this due to the great reviews but don't get why my towel sucked so much. I've only used this once and it severely stained my yoga mat. I laid the towel on top of my mat and sprayed some water on it and you can see exactly where I sprayed. I don't even know how this happens? Update: my issue was handled promptly and youphoria went out of their way to correct the issue. I'm updating my review because I was so thrilled with the customer service I received.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Need customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to reach youphoria customer service in regards to the towel I just received in the mail with a large hole and run in the seam. When I try to contact them with a message it won't go through saying that I have an invalid email address and there isn't a phone number to contact. The towel itself seems like good quality however I would like one without a hole from the start
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have sweaty palms & feet. So I do the slip & slide on my mat; most especially during downward dog. At first I thought I just needed one of those non-slip mats - since that's what a friend suggested. I thought buying another mat would be pointless & costly when I already have a mat & it's fairly new. I decided, well I'll just stop & wipe the sweat off or use a hand towel. Then I came across this AND I LOVE IT! No more slipping & sliding! I saw no problems slipping even when the towel was dry. I recommended this to my friend since she's been having the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: This is the best towel ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been experimenting with yoga towels. This is an inexpensive towel, so I was expecting the more expensive towels to be more effective. I was wrong. This is the best towel ever. Doesn't slip or slide. I never notice it during practice. I have a Jade mat (for reference). I purchased more expensive towels and I didn't like how I was too conscious of the towel during practice. With this towel, I don't notice it, because I'm focusing on my practice, not the towel. A ++ in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: I do not like this towel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this towel and another highly rated towel on Amazon to compare the quality and grip during my hot yoga classes. I do not like this towel, it does not stick to my mat even if I mist the towel with water. I've tried pouring more water on the towel to grip my mat and it still move around and bunches up under my feet when I make any transition in poses. There is NO RUBBER grip on the bottom of this towel. If you're an avid hot yoga practitioner then this towel is not for you, there are better ones on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L. Lamorena

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these towels a few months ago and have used it once or twice a week since then. I also had purchased 2 yoga towels directly from my studio that had the grippy things on one side, assuming since they're sold at the studio these must work well. I cannot use those towels, my hands and feet continuously slip no matter how wet or dry the towels are. However, these microfiber towels have never let me down. They soak up a crazy amount of sweat, I leave there completely drenched. After the grippy towels proved to be an utter disappointment, I came back and ordered 2 more of these towels and am so happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: red04

customer_reviews.title: This towel is not like advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This towel is not like how it is advertised. The microfiber material is soft, but it is also slippery. This is a problem in yoga because it does not stay set on the mat and bunches up when transitioning poses. I was very frustrated during my Drishti yoga as I had to stop and straighten it out several times during class. This happened despite washing as directed and spraying it with water before class. I have used it twice and am very disappointed. I do not recommend this product. I will probably just cut it up in to smaller towels to use as sweat mop.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it over gym mats
customer_reviews.text: I bring this to my local gym class and put it over the commual mats. Those mats aren't exactly all that clean you know. The towel is easier to bring than lugging my own mat, plus I can just put it in the wash every week. The reason for 4 stars is because there is already a snag when I got it. The item looks like it was repackaged from a return. Since I needed it right away and I know I will probably abuse it I didn't bother to return it. Other than that the towel is comfortable to lay on. I don't sweat all that much so I can't say how absorbant it is.
customer_reviews.author: Starruby

customer_reviews.title: One use..two weeks old and the stitching is coming undone!
customer_reviews.text: This item could have been perfect until the colored stitching around the edges started to fray after a single use and a total of two weeks time since purchase. The size and material worked well for my traveling needs ut I am sad about the durability issues I am already experiencing. Update- company contacted me about the issues and wanted to make sure my experience was good and issued a replacement at no charge. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the purple yoga towel with gray stitching. It's perfect! The towel doesn't move around under your feet while you're changing positions like some do. I can choose to wear or not wear yoga socks and I am equally comfortable. I will say that I love the added cushioning from using the towel with the Youphoria Yoga Mat. It makes the floor positions and corpse pose much easier on my bony backside. However, on a carpeted floor, you won't need the added cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh O.

customer_reviews.title: Not Colorfast!
customer_reviews.text: My first one star. The towel bleeds terribly. If my yoga clothes and mat were not black, it would have been a disaster. The stains on my shower curtain where the towel dried were mostly removed after 15 minutes of cleaning with chlorine bleach. I would not put this in the washing machine with any other clothes, which means I can't use it. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered two more
customer_reviews.text: I practice hot yoga regularly - I sweat a fair amount and I stink. I have been a faithful supporter of yogitoes since inception because it’s an essential component for hot flow. Despite washing my towels immediately after practice (with Sports Tide), inevitably the stink still takes a hold. With YouPhoria’s towel that has not happened (and it’s half the price). I’m washing this 3 times a week - still soft and no issues getting it to ‘adhere/stick’ to my yoga mat. My review title is for real - I just bought two more. Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: SKR

customer_reviews.title: Mmm
customer_reviews.text: I really thought I would like it because it had so many good reviews. When I received it it felt kind of mmm “heavy”. Now i’ve used it twice in yoga and I gues I rather don’t use it at all. I find it very hot, I don’t like the feeling of the fabric in my hands and feet. It is also a little slippery. I am gonna look for a different towel, I hope one with a different fabric. **very good customer support.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: I thought it came with the yoga mat attached to it, but nope. It’s just a large thin yoga towel. My bad. I didn’t knock it any stars for my mistake. I knocked it for the following reasons. It absorbs sweat real good. While doing yoga it gets very wet and nasty. It slips and doesn’t stay in place when you put it on a yoga mat. I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel towel can even work as a beach towel!
customer_reviews.text: Great travel towel. I had another one of these that was just way too tiny, I think I got the extra large which is amazing and worth the slight extra bulk. Like the colors and dries very quickly. Thee snap ring is also awesome, and saved me a few times drying it on a moving boat, where other people lost their belongings even with clips!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Double

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these towels I’ve bought. I’ve had the other for about 2 years, but sometimes I don’t get it washed before my next yoga session (so it gets a bit stinko). Great towel for the cost. Perfect size. Sticks to my mat just right. Lightweight. Makes a yoga session much more comfortable, especially if you do hot yoga or you are a sweater.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, I had to return this. Wanted to like it, the fabric feels nice, but it turned into a wadded up mess on my yoga mat the first time I used it. Followed the instructions exactly - do fabric softener, no dryer... but no luck for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laura @ Island Paws Studio

customer_reviews.title: It works for my particular yoga practice!
customer_reviews.text: It looks nothing like the product pictured on the Amazon site! The picture shows a much heftier two toned mat towel; which is what I thought I wanted! However, I needed to use the towel and I do like the smaller size and softness/weight of the towel! It works for me, but think maybe I over paid!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Richter

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft towel, but not great for hot classes.
customer_reviews.text: This towel is just okay for hot classes. It doesn't move or cause me to slip. It is thinner and softer than most, so it actually absorbs sweat faster and sticks to my mat and stays in place for the duration of the class. But, that is also the problem. It is wet and not at all comfortable to lie on, or adjust your hands or feet, as they also stick. Although not ideal for hot classes, I use this at least once of week for nidra, yin, or medication practice. I roll it up and place it under my neck and can stay comfortable for a 90 minute class without having to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Purchase Princess

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this towel. Try another brand.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this yoga towel. I purchased this for my hot yoga classes after seeing other people in my class also using a towel to cover the mat. I started using this and my feet would be able to pick up the towel and whenever I tried to change a pose it'll also lift up. Its not only distracting but also dangerous because my feet would get caught in the folds. The towel is very harsh and not soft/microfiber feel so it won't stay on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Supragrl

customer_reviews.title: Good yoga mat.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the mat but it isn't my favorite one ever. The price is awesome. It does move around a lot on my mat during hot classes but not to the point where I give up on it. It absorbs my lovely sweat very well and definitely can't complain about that! My least favorite thing about it is every time I touch it (weird to say) but I feel like my hands are super, super dry and my skin "sticks" to it like a static feeling. That may make no sense to some but even after washing it I didn't get any relief from that dry feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D'Richards

customer_reviews.title: Very soft but moves during postures
customer_reviews.text: This towel is very soft and has a vibrant color, but it moves over the yoga mat as you move your feet on it. some towels have pockets on the corners so you can slide in the yoga mat and it prevents the towel to move. This product, unfortunately, doesn't have that and I didn't realize it can make that much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Golnaz K

customer_reviews.title: STAINS YOUR CLOTHES
customer_reviews.text: Probably wondering why there are a pair of socks in the photo. This yoga towel stained my white cycling socks in the wash. No bleach was used and it stained my clothes. What kind of trash materials are they using that stains these days? I would absolutely never recommend that product to anyone. Ruined my cycling socks which are more expensive than this budget towel. Fork over some more cash for some other brands they won’t ruin all your clothes. You’ll save money in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great deal so I thought I'd give it a try. First impression was this towel felt cheap and thin. After unwrapping it I found holes and a lot of pulling on one side of the towel. Very happy that Amazon is so easy to deal with when it comes to returns. This one is going back. Sticking to Yoga Rat. Sorry You photos😖 ***Update. Youphoria reached out to me and is sending me another towel without even having to return my original order. Nice way to do business. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Firemanski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - small, light, clean!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my gym provides yoga mats, so I didn’t have to shell out for a mat. The only drawback was that shared mats aren’t exactly sanitary! This is the perfect solution. It rolls up to a very small and light bundle in my gym bag and I can just toss it in the washing machine once a week. The only time I have grip issues is when I leave my socks on (but that’s on me, not the towel). The towel sticks to the mat pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: KFitz

customer_reviews.title: Goes well with the Gaiam Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: The positive reviews of this mat speak for themselves. Very happy with this mat as it goes perfectly well size wise with my Gaiam Yoga mat. The color, fabric and texture of the mat are very good quality and has good absorption while also being quick drying. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zhill

customer_reviews.title: For a thin, soggy mess, try this towel...
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. I sent it back immediately. The picture makes it look so fluffy and dense, with a beautiful blue backing, but it's thin, VERY course, and there's only a tiny amount of blue stitching on the edges. My favorite yoga towels have grips on the underside so I don't have to spray the whole thing with water to aid gripping. I can't stand working out on a cold, soggy pad.
customer_reviews.author: jean hanvik

customer_reviews.title: Great hot yoga mat towel
customer_reviews.text: there's nothing especially fancy about this yoga mat but it works so incredibly well. I got it for hot yoga and found that it stays well on my sticky mat. I wish it had one of those corners to keep it fully in place but it's not really so cheap compared to anything else that I could find. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Dries So Quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great "towel." It's so soft, and it's nice and big. Used it at the pool and beach, and got it pretty soaked. Just brought it in and draped it over a chair on the porch. Was going back to the beach about an hour later and it was almost completely dry! It was a super purchase for me, and am sure you'll love it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie'sMomTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this towel because I started sweating uncontrollably during my yoga practice. I expected it to work okay, but it actually works REALLY well. It absorbs my sweat perfectly and fits my entire yoga mat. I am no longer slipping and sliding everywhere and I am thankful to have found this towel!
customer_reviews.author: Shari Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great mat towel
customer_reviews.text: This yoga towel is nice, soft, and has a great grip to my mat, so that I'm not constantly fixing it. It hasn't been tested yet in a true heated room. Usually I do my bikram hot yoga at my studio in a room of 105 degrees and 60% humidity. At home I'm only able to get my room to about 90 degrees and I have no idea about the humidity, but it's definitely not 60%. I'll update once I'm able to truly test the towel, but for now it's doing its job and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: It does hold up nicely after washing
customer_reviews.text: It's not really so grippy at all. Even when wet. It's a bit too thin to absorb my sweat from a hot yoga session. It does hold up nicely after washing, but it can retain quite the stink if not washed correctly. I think there has to be better mats out there, but the price on this was was pretty reasonable. I'd lean towards three stars but overall, it works for what it needs to do and has quality construction which just bumped it to four. Watch out for the lack of grippiness though.
customer_reviews.author: Am Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect. I'm a sweaty yoga practicer. I start dripping sweat and the towel stays in place (for the most part, unless you drag your feet or something). And it absorbs very well and stays very grippy. Prob going to buy another to rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good but I would not say it is non slip towel. During my 90 minute yoga class, I kept slipping. Overall it gets the job done ,but would prefer if it stayed in one place throughout the entire class time.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my wife for Christmas. She ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas. She tried it but unfortunately said it doesn't work. It slips and doesn't stay in place. I tried to return, but by the time I looked into the process it was after the 30 day period. Not sure how this is supposed to stay in place as there is no rubber? I just bought a different one from Sears for Mother's Day with a rubber/grip side and that seems to work well. Update: Changing to 3 stars. The company was kind enough to offer a full refund even though it was after the return date. That was much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay out on your yoga mat.
customer_reviews.text: Although the predict itself was soft, color was beautiful the fact that it would not stay in place while doing yoga made me send it back. I keep having to adjust it during my practice and eventually just took it off.
customer_reviews.author: Rav3nsj3w3l

customer_reviews.title: Try the Shandali GoSweat Hot Yoga Towel and then try ...
customer_reviews.text: Try the Shandali GoSweat Hot Yoga Towel and then try this; you will see the difference. This one is light and slippery
customer_reviews.author: Skittles

customer_reviews.title: ruined many a nice clothes with the border color bleeding during wash
customer_reviews.text: My mistake washing this with clothes, but it bled like a ... It is the same product as all the other yoga mat towels and it is not the products fault, but I can't give it four stars b/c I have to buy new clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Meep

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this towel, but it didn't work out
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this towel, but it didn't work out. First, you have to get it pretty wet for it to stay on your mat. Which is ok, but once it starts drying out during class then it will move around. Then when it's not wet, it would stick to the rough edges of my feet. And the final straw was that it would shred up the bottom of my toes. I guess I have thin skin on my toes but one day during class my toes were hurting. I looked down and strips of skin were hanging off. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent but doesn’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: This yoga towel does a great job of absorbing my sweat but it doesn’t grip the mat at all and the material bunches up as I change through the poses. I immediately bought a different yoga towel
customer_reviews.author: Ella j

customer_reviews.title: does not really observe we
customer_reviews.text: I used this towel for hot yoga classes. I like that it is light weight but when i sweat, my hands and feet slip. it does not absorb the sweat properly. I catch my self trying to balance with the sweat instead of my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Hot Yoga Manduka
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Very absorbent Doesn’t move during my practice Dislikes - Towel is not wide enough for my Manduka. - the tab don’t add any benefit because it is not wide enough for my mat Used for hot yoga
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Quality seller and product
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, it is a great yoga towel and strong anti slip. There was a snaffu on the color scheme on my original order - root cause the Amazon fulfillment had placed a pick label with the reverse towel color to stitch accent... yes first world problems. Youphoria Cheif Heart Officer, Jessi - made it right. Quality product from a quality seller.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: OK yoga this mat towel
customer_reviews.text: It is what it said it would be, but I do not care for the texture. It has loops that make my fingers get caught on. The color green is a bright yellow lime green. Wish it was more subdued. Anyway, it is absorbent and the price was good, but not my fave.
customer_reviews.author: IVJ

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to YogiToes!!
customer_reviews.text: When you're doing yoga you constantly are on the search for a bargain- everything adds up! yoga pants, mats, tops - not to mention the classes themselves! This handy (and price-savvy) towel has been an EXCELLENT addition to my piping-hot and sweaty power yoga classes. It's lightweight (lighter than the yogitoes) and somehow stays in place REALLY well. I've only recently started to slip a little bit on mine (and that's because I've done 5 classes on it without washing- eeep!) but it's held up SO well so far. I'm holding onto this one and I'm SO happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Monique French

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a lot of trouble to have to wet it ...
customer_reviews.text: Towel bunches and doesn't stay put when doing hot yoga. Seems like a lot of trouble to have to wet it every time before use so, I didn't use it that way...may work better if you do though. This is a good towel to keep in my car though for kid spills and random messes. Very soft and washes well. The company is awesome though and sent me a full refund since I wasn't happy with the towel for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Soaks up sweat during a super intense hot yoga session
customer_reviews.text: Soaks up sweat during a super intense hot yoga session. I was finally able to finish a hot yoga session without slipping and sliding in my own sweat! (gross, I know). Only complaint is that the towel does tend to slip a little when placed on the mat, so just be extra mindful when using it, especially in a really hot and humid room with excessive sweating. Like another review has stated, I do find that this towel works better the more you sweat on it which sounds counterintuitive but it's true. Great purchase otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and great for hot yoga!
customer_reviews.text: I love doing hot yoga, but I slip and slide all over my mat as I get sweaty. This towel completely solves that problem! I'm able to enjoy my practice more thanks to the mat. It does bunch up a little as the class progresses, possibly because there are no stoppers on an "underside of the towel." Truthfully, I prefer not having the stoppers because they wear on my knees. REGARDLESS, it is a GREAT TOWEL for such a GREAT PRICE. I would definitely buy one again. Side note: it comes with care instructions to prolong the life of the towel!
customer_reviews.author: Lizz C

customer_reviews.title: Hot yoga must
customer_reviews.text: Great for soaking up all the yoga yummies and not so yummies. Five stars all around and of course I would recommend if you sweat a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Forever Filipina

customer_reviews.title: Jury still out
customer_reviews.text: I had expected something "mattier" than this product. I use it to cover the very thin yoga mat I've had for years, which makes me think I'm having a cleaner and more sanitary workout. I appreciate being able to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Joaninha

customer_reviews.title: Not good for hot vinyasa yoga
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing towel. I've bought a few yoga towels trying to find an affordable, but still effective towel. This was not it. It's very thick and stores a lot of heat. When you do hot yoga, you don't want to add even more heat to the equation. It also slides all over the mat. I sprayed mine down with water hoping that would help, but I ended up still spending my entire practice rearranging the towel on the mat. If you do CorePower, this is not the mat for you.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Mat slips.
customer_reviews.text: The towel might be good for soaking up sweat, but during a normal practice, the towel, even when placed over a mat would slip (as during downward dog) causes both the feet and hands to slip, but the feet sometimes also stick and move the mat. If this towel were wet, I can see it being more effective against slippage on both sides, but as it is now, not good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga mat towel!! It makes my feet happy in yoga class... try it, you’ll see what I mean. If you do hot yoga and don’t want to see your sweat drip and land on the towel get a lighter color. I got the dark grey and see all my hard work via the pools of sweat on my towel - yay! namaste : )
customer_reviews.author: Jeannemax

customer_reviews.title: It's a miracle the towel still likes me despite how much I have sweat on it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this towel alongside the Youphoria yoga mat and have been overall very pleased. The towel had surely been put through the ringer with several weeks a sweat filled yoga classes, and it has held up great and met my needs. The one issue I have had is preventing the towel from sliding around on top of my mat. I have found a slight remedy in following their recommendation of dampening the towel prior to laying it on the mat, but I think it would be beneficial, as I have seen with other towels, to have slight elastic around the corners to go around the edges of a yoga mat. Minor recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great mat towel for hot yoga.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for the past few weeks in a hot yoga class. Covers my entire mat and is very absorbent. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Okay for gentle yoga or as a towel for stretching, but not hot yoga
customer_reviews.text: I am all bunched up with this towel. Not good for high impact hot yoga. I need one that sticks to my mat and doesn't bunch up. Other than that it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: LPark

customer_reviews.title: works better if you wet your mat first then place the ...
customer_reviews.text: soft and doesn't slip too much when i'm using it. IT does move around my yoga mat quite a bit though overall a solid product for the price TIP: works better if you wet your mat first then place the towel over it. seems to "stick" to the mat better that way. also the towel itself is less slippery for my hands if i wet it first as well prior to class
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Grip "Youphoria"!
customer_reviews.text: Are you tired of sweating like a pig, and slipping like a fish all over yoga class? How embarassing! Have you ever wanted to perform yoga to the fullest of your ability, without fear of ridicule from your fellow yogis? Well, look no further! You'll be in "Youphoria" when you try this mat! This spongy mat will soak up GALLONS of sweat, and your grip... will never slip again! Youphoria - Grip. Guaranteed. --------------------------- In all seriousness, I pour sweat in hot yoga class, and I don't slip at all with this towel. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Yemner Reyjers

customer_reviews.title: I love how it absorbs sweat for laying poses and dries ...
customer_reviews.text: I just started Hot Yoga (Haiyasa). This is my first hot-yoga towel and it makes a world of difference. It is doesn't have enough grip when first starting, so I fold it back but keep it in the middle of my mat. As I get sweaty, I unfold it and it works well for grip then. I love how it absorbs sweat for laying poses and dries very quickly. If I order a second towel, I will try Manduka's towel with the little grippers.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Vertin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't maintain grip.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight towel with a pleasant, soft feel. But, it does not provide much in the way of grip, particularly as I am a heavy sweater (hot yoga, Vinyasa, and aerobic, cardio-style sessions). It slips a little when wet. I have tried it out for 3-4 weeks now. I will use it as a reserve towel or for drying off after showers as I phase in better towels for my mat.
customer_reviews.author: IamSpartacus

customer_reviews.title: This towel works and for the price is great but it does bunch up on me a ton ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few yoga towels and am an avid hot yoga participant. This towel works and for the price is great but it does bunch up on me a ton and I use lots of water prior to class to get it to stick to my mat. I would recommend it still since the other towels can be over $50 but if you are a daily hot yoga person it may be worth spending the extra cash for a towel with rubber grips.
customer_reviews.author: The Silva Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just love the softness, the brilliant color, and the quality. Makes my floor workouts so much more comfortable on my mat. Fits over my mat perfectly. Great not to slip or sweat and feel a sticky mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't use for everyday work outs like I do when I need it. It slips under my hands and it's not that cushioned or thick. Would only use for yoga or whatever. Have to get a new one for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Loveonlineshopping

customer_reviews.title: Good for body not great for mat
customer_reviews.text: I waited with my review until I tried it out several times. I do Power Yoga every day in a very hot room (F 100+). It's really more like a towel for the body than a towel for the mat. It is soft, very plush and absorbs sweat. But to lay it on top of the mat it is too plush, too lightweight and limp. Other brands with shorter fibers I personally find more suitable. However, I do use it as a body towel and there it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Saba

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay but not as skid resistance as I like. I still find myself slipping with my yoga socks.
customer_reviews.author: Kahlua

customer_reviews.title: The good: this mat is super duper soft
customer_reviews.text: The good: this mat is super duper soft. It did a great job absorbing sweat. It stayed put on my mat without any slipping for a Bikram class. It washed well without any pilling. The not so great: laying down on this towel during the floor series is like being hugged by a sweaty team mascot in a fake fur costume. This won't be my go to towel for Bikram, but it will be fabulous for yin practices.
customer_reviews.author: KellyAnne

customer_reviews.title: Item came dirty and used.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived dirty covered with grass, the towel is not of comparably priced based on the quality. I have cheap chinese towels I pay very little for and they arrive clean and were thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Off Grid Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition for Hot Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I love going to hot yoga but having the right yoga towel to absorb the buckets of sweat is very important. This yoga towel by Youphoria does the job. The towel dries pretty quickly, does not accumulate stink/smells and covers the whole yoga mat. However the only issue (but a small issue) is that the towel sometimes slips. But once it becomes somewhat wet with either sweat and/or water it reduces some of the slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlene Y. Small

customer_reviews.title: Now the ONLY Mat I use
customer_reviews.text: as a yoga enthusiast, this is rare that I post a review on a product that typically holds it's own. But this product is not only a mat but a thick soft towel, it is not like a typical yoga mat and that is a good thing. It is now the only mat I use.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Fox Blog

customer_reviews.title: Food but not stay in place too well
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good yoga towel, but not really stick on the yoga met. I need to fixed it couple times during exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Pamelor

customer_reviews.title: Great towel for hot yoga. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my Matymats Yoga Mat. No slippage, easy to clean. After about 10 uses, the towel really doesn't slide around and get wrinkled. I see many of my classmates straightening out their towels during class as they move around, but I lay mine down at the beginning of class and there is no need to fool with it. It stays right where I put it. No need to get it moist beforehand either.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hansberry

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Yoga Towel, worth possessing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, worth purchasing. If you are a serious Yoga person, you should buy this towel. Thanks to BDS Outlets and Amazon for a fast shipping. It came in a day (much more than our Amazon Prime!). Excellent care was taken while packaging this (not in a loose plastic sack!). It was ordered for my daughter, who is enjoying it during every Yoga class. We would definitely recommend this family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: gsbr

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: It is very thin and slippery...had to retutn it....i followed the instructions as well...
customer_reviews.author: Let's get crafty

customer_reviews.title: Kept moving
customer_reviews.text: Absorbent but didn’t stay in place for yoga. Even wetting down my mat didn’t keep it in place. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amzel

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is WONDERFUL! It dries incredibly fast! You do need to get used to dabbing yourself off instead of rubbing (which is better for your skin anyway). This towel is super absorbent and dries me off in no time. I hang it to dry in front of a fan and in less than 30 mins it's bone dry again! Even when not dried in front of moving air, the towel dries so fast, I'm always amazed. Love this towel and will be purchasing more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.RedBeard

customer_reviews.title: A little slippery after awhile
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these about a month and a half ago and have used each probably 10 times. They were just what I needed at first, but I've noticed that my hands and feet are starting to slide in down dog a little bit now. Maybe they've started to lose their grip after so many washes and uses? Overall, though, they're really not bad for the price. And if you don't use as frequently as I do, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Mussey

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TOWEL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This really DOES keep me from sliding on my not-so-sticky mat and wicks up sweat. It even adds an unexpected level of comfort to my practice as it is soft and plush feeling. I love it way more than I thought I would. Use it every time I practice - hot or not.
customer_reviews.author: M. Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Yoga Towel
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once. It does everything I need. It fits a standard yoga mat. Is it durable? We will find out
customer_reviews.author: Eric John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect towel for hot vinyasa
customer_reviews.text: I use this for hot vinyasa yoga. I haD used towels previously that had silicon or rubber dots on one side to prevent them from moving on the mat and found over time they washed off or became a nusence. This towel stays in place even in an active class like vinyasa, dries quickly and doesn't hold the sweaty smell when it's dry. I liked it so much I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga towel
customer_reviews.text: I have a yogietoes towel and needed a secondary backup. I did not want to take out a home equity loan to add to my yoga paraphernalia, so I decided to give this a try. So far so good. I love the towel, it is a perfect fit for my manduka prolite, and I have washed it a couple of times successfully. Will keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Ina

customer_reviews.title: Needs to prevent slipping
customer_reviews.text: This product is OK as a towel but I purchased it because I needed not only absorbency but also anti-slipping, especially when you get sweaty
customer_reviews.author: Evan Hou

customer_reviews.title: Terrible value, threads fell apart after first wash
customer_reviews.text: I used this towel once for a yoga sculpting class, then I washed it on a delicate cycle. The threads fell apart once I took out of the dryer, also on a gentle cycle. So disappointed for a towel I paid almost $20 for...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Improved my bikram practice!!
customer_reviews.text: My go-to towel for my bikram yoga practice. It makes such a huge difference!! No more slipping, sliding and adjusting. It fits perfectly over my mat and is durable. I do bikram about five times a week and I use this towel every single time. I do not wash it after every use. I air dry it on my balcony after each class and it is amazingly fresh the next day. I literally wash this only once a week!! I am probably going to buy more just for the diversity in color and because I am IN LOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Han

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Yoga Towel
customer_reviews.text: My favorite yoga towel by far! I have a few others just to make sure I always have clean towels for class, but this towel is hands down my go-to. Soft, but still grips - it does not feel rough when dry like other brands. Great assortment of colors, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: I Sweat a lot
customer_reviews.text: I sweat a ton, and while its pretty heavy after a session of hot yoga, it is up to the task of soaking up the pool I would otherwise create.
customer_reviews.author: Mil736

customer_reviews.title: and they work but are not comfortable and I try to take them off of I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found my solution to matte slipping. I got the yoga paws, and they work but are not comfortable and I try to take them off of I don't think I'm going to downward dog for a while. I've purchased a couple different types of mattes and even though I'm not sweaty, I'm always slipping. Towel is the answer. Sometimes it bunches up or requires adjustment but I'm pretty happy. Also, I prefer throwing it in the wash to wiping down my yoga matte. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Stocky mum

customer_reviews.title: Good, if you don't move around a lot
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. It does help with slipping, but now my issue is tripping. The towel bunches up and won't stay put. When I "flip my dog" I have to jump so the towel doesn't get twisted around my foot. I'm constantly adjusting it during class which is a distraction. This would be better suited for practices that don't require a ton of movement.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: but was quite disappointed in that it DID NOT help my grip and
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive this towel to use during hot Vinyasa, but was quite disappointed in that it DID NOT help my grip and, in fact, made everything much more slippery. The whole time during class, I was worried about slipping. I'll stick to just washing my mat with spray from now on to clean it instead of trying to use a towel to protect it from sweat.
customer_reviews.author: RunningMommy

customer_reviews.title: Used towel delivered
customer_reviews.text: After reading many good reviews, I wanted to try this towel out in my hot yoga class. With the affordable price & high ratings, I thought this would be a great deal. However, a used towel was delivered to me today. The packaging for the towel was clearly opened & the towel was sloppily rolled back up. In addition, a tangled mess of hair was sitting on the towel. It looked as though someone had used, washed, & returned it. This was very disappointing. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: **AAA** Fast Shipping and Totally as Described!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE TOWELS!!!! So soft, so absorbent, so quick dry!!!! Like the color choices too, it makes it easier to know who's is who's. Shipping was super fast! Great experience! Will buy more in the near future!!!
customer_reviews.author: Onna F.

customer_reviews.title: Pay more for better quality
customer_reviews.text: I expected this yoga towel to stick more to my mat while I practiced but instead it bunches all up! I think you can find better quality towels out there, but that’s what you get for only $16!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Russo

customer_reviews.title: This slippery towel almost turned my hot yoga class into a laugh yoga class real fast...
customer_reviews.text: Hmmmm...I'm wondering about the rave reviews that duped me into buying this SLIPPERY, SLIPPERY yoga towel that almost turned my hot yoga class into a laugh yoga class due to the gymnastics I had to perform to recover from this towel SLIPPING ON MY YOGA MAT!!!! So not funny....
customer_reviews.author: Evey Wolverine

customer_reviews.title: Well made and has a great texture to it
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and arrived as promised. Well made and has a great texture to it. Great texture and well made. I did slipped a few times during my yoga practice while in a downward dog pose... meh. Otherwise, I give it 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: LG2k5

customer_reviews.title: This is a great towel for when I will be traveling in a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great towel for when I will be traveling in a very humid environment that won't have access to dryers. This towel will dry on it's own without a need to keep a sop soaking wet towel in my pack which is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yoga mat for me
customer_reviews.text: I sweat so much when I do hot yoga... I really needed this. It rolls easily into the matt, washed it several times and it's still like new. Sometimes pictures and marketing promote well and then underdeliver. I liked the picture and marketing and I was very pleased the product lived up to the promotion. Well done Youphoria!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome towel!
customer_reviews.text: I started hot yoga a couple of months ago. I needed something to help me stay on my mat which had started turning into a "slip and slide" with my sweat! This towel does that and more! It helps me stay focused on the poses because I don't worry about slipping anymore! When I lay down, it helps absorb all the sweat, I love it! When I get home, I just toss it into the washer and lay it out to dry, it is ready to go for the next class!
customer_reviews.author: P. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with this Yoga Towel!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable, substantial, durable and attractive yoga towel. And it doesn’t slide all over the floor (or any place for that matter).
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality towel, very soft to the touch and washes up nicely. Also very absorbent in my hot yoga class. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Russ OHare

customer_reviews.title: sooooo I guess I did good.: ) I love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my grandson, who is an avid outdoorsman, for Christmas. Then bought one for myself. He hasn't seen his yet BUT when he saw mine, he wanted to snatch it for himself, sooooo I guess I did good. :) I love it! lightweight but soft and absorbent! Perfect backpacking towel.
customer_reviews.author: P. Samson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The customer service for this company is amazing. They want 100% satisfaction and they mean it! The towel itself does not grip as well as I would have liked. You really need to get it wet, and even then I find I am fixing it throughout my practice. Just for the customer service quality, I would purchase items from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Youphoria Yoga Towel 24 x 72 - Microfiber Non Slip Yoga Mat Towel - Skidless Grip, Ultra Soft and Sweat Absorbent
feature_bullets: NON-SLIP & SKID-LESS: Does sweating turn your yoga mat into a Slip and Slide? Our yoga towels grip best when wet making them perfect for your Bikram or Hot yoga sessions. Stay grounded, focused, and in perfect balance during your practice.

SUPER ABSORBENT & QUICK DRYING: Made of lightweight Microfiber, Youphoria Yoga towels are made to absorb 7X their weight in water. Just wash on cold after each sweaty use, and pop them in the dryer to be good to go, again, in no time.

EXTEND MAT LIFE & REDUCE BACTERIA RISK: Over time, excessive sweat build-up can turn your yoga mat into a funky, bacteria-laden nightmare. Our towels add a hygienic layer between you and your (or loaner) mat. You’ll never fear that studio mat, again.

SIZED RIGHT: Our hot yoga towel is the perfect size for any yoga mat. At, 24 x 72 inches, it also makes a full-sized travel companion. Just toss it in your carry-on or back-pack and enjoy practicing in your hotel room.
SILICONE-FREE TECHNOLOGY: The tacky fibers of our microfiber, when wet, grip your yoga mat and your skin, preventing dangerous slipping, without the use of synthetic products like silicone or latex.
